description: Initial modular always-visible small font Stepper component. Accepts steps, currentStep, onStepClick. Minimal, sticky, and modular.
Add DialogDescription to DialogContent in RequirementHistory for accessibility and to fix Radix warning.
Fix ChatInterface: questions state now stores question objects, and all usages reference .question, preventing React child object errors.
RequirementWizard: add requirements field to specification for validation compatibility.
ArtifactGenerator: defensively ensure requirements field is present in specification before generation API call.
